title: Mouse lag
body: Is it possible for your mouse to have input lag? I am starting to think its my mouse and not my computer....

replies.body: Okay I tested it out, it was my mouse. My right click (movement click) didn't work 100% of the time. I tested this by switching it from MB2 to shift MB1. I think you guys should allow us to switch MB1 and MB2 for movement click, because currently you cant. I just got a new mouse.
It's possible to have the mouse lag behind your movements, is this happening only in League or all the time on your computer?
